    public class PowerSet<E>
extends java.util.AbstractCollection<java.util.Collection<E>>
    Calculate the power set of a collection.
    Author:
    Uli Schlachter

    • Constructor Detail

      • PowerSet

        public PowerSet(java.util.Collection<E> c)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        c - The collection whose power set should be generated. This collection must have stable iteration order so that iterating multiple times over it always produces elements in the same order! For lists this is already the case. Other types of collections will be copied into an ArrayList to guarantee stable iteration order.

        public static <E> PowerSet<E> powerSet(java.util.Collection<E> c)
        Produce the power set of a collection
        Type Parameters:
